title: AGENTS.md — Guidance for AI Agents
text: Language, naming, comments, commit messages English . Use roxygen2 (e.g. #' @param, @return) documentation. Follow tidyverse style: 2-space indent, spaces around operators. Functions variable names snake_case.

title: AGENTS.md — Guidance for AI Agents
text: Prioritise clarity readability cleverness. Use pure functions clearly defined inputs outputs possible. Follow Single Responsibility Principle — function one thing. Avoid code duplication — use helper functions factor repeated logic. Use early returns reduce indentation nesting. Avoid deeply nested logic long functions; split logic modular components. Document every exported function consistent roxygen tags. Use @export public functions .

title: AGENTS.md — Guidance for AI Agents
text: package uses testthat unit testing: Mirror function names tests/testthat/test-*.R. Use test_that(“description”, { … }) blocks. Prefer multiple small, readable expectations. Mock external data randomness needed repeatability.

what: 📖 Tone and Style Guide for Vignettes
title: AGENTS.md — Guidance for AI Agents
text: Vignettes aim : Friendly accessible — Write ’re explaining concepts informed non-expert colleague. Accurate precise — Technical correctness essential. Avoid oversimplifying core ideas. Narrative structure — Use clear logical flow: introduce purpose, explain context, walk examples. Example-driven — Use realistic, well-commented examples demonstrate concepts. Wherever possible, relate examples plausible use cases.
